titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2352) to amend the Small Business Act, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2352) to amend the Small Business Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 111-121, by Mr. Polis (CO).

The resolution provides that the amendment in the nature of a sustitute recommended by the Committee on Small Business now printed in the bill shall be considered as an original bill for the purpose of amendment and shall be considered as read.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 56.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 457.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H.Res. 457, the Chair put the question on ordering the previous question and by voice vote announced that the ayes had prevailed. Ms. Foxx demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings until later in the legislative day.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 244 - 175, 1 Present (Roll no. 274).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 247 - 175 (Roll no. 275).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2352) to amend the Small Business Act.
